Name: Cafe de Zon
Review Text: Stumbled across Cafe De Zon and what a little gem.  Were made feel very welcome by friendly owner and locals.  Great beer and a MUST see if you like football and are in the area.

Name: Cafe de Zon
Review Text: Would not recommend. Rude owner, not good service. Lots better nearby.

Name: Cafe de Zon
Review Text: Popped in for a beer whilst strolling around Amsterdam. Nice bar, probably more for locals but we were made very welcome and the lady made us some very nice cheese toasties to go with our beers!

Name: Cafe de Zon
Review Text: Busy little coffee shop, reasonable price.

Name: Cafe de Zon
Review Text: Lovely old cafe with friendly host and clientelle. Great place to chill out sightly off beaten track but near many attractions.

Name: Cafe de Zon
Review Text: Great, friendly bar. Nice area set back from the bustle of Amsterdam. Really friendly owner.
